name: Snowshoeing in the Canadian Rockies 2nd Edition
categories: Snowshoeing in the Canadian Rockies - 2nd Edi
description: Stride through 100+ snowshoe routes in the Canadian Rockies, from scenic Waterton in the south to the Columbia Icefield in the northern part of Banff National Park. Photos, maps, and detailed route descriptions are provided for each trip, as well as level of difficulty, objective hazards, and additional equipment requirements. Includes trips for experienced backcountry travellers or those just getting into snowshoeing. Choose an easy day on flat terrain, or a summit climb with far-reaching views.
